snippet: Officer Daniel Ellis, 33, of the Richmond police, died early Friday, two days after he was ambushed and shot in the head while searching an apartment for a robbery suspect, the authorities said.
abstract: Richmond, Ky, Police Officer Daniel Ellis dies two days after being shot in head while searching apartment for robbery suspect Raleigh Sizemore.
lead_paragraph: Officer Daniel Ellis, 33, of the Richmond police, died early Friday, two days after he was ambushed and shot in the head while searching an apartment for a robbery suspect, the authorities said.

headline.main: Kentucky: Officer Shot in Ambush Dies
headline.print_headline: Kentucky: Officer Shot in Ambush Dies
